Finally, a Real Wapedia Alternative!
When Wapedia became outdated and finally shut down, I searched for alternatives and couldn't find any… until now. It's got a few of my favorite wikis, and the UI is fantastic -- the sections are not automatically collapsed like they are in most Android Wiki apps (something I really hate). I do have a couple of suggestions: besides expanding the wiki selection, I would really like it if I had the ability to sort my bookmarks and put them in folders. EDIT: For some reason, the app has been crashing a lot.
